title: Cheesy Broccoli and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['185g broccoli florets', '1 onion, sliced', '1 tablespoon margarine', '1 (295g) tin cream of celery condensed soup', '250ml milk', '125ml water', '3/4 teaspoon chopped fresh basil', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '40g Cheddar cheese, grated']
